definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: The judge was lenient with the wrongdoer.
sentences.chinese: 法官对这个犯人很宽大。

sentences.english: His shoulders were broad and strong, his hands were very strong.
sentences.chinese: 他有宽大强壮的肩膊，两只有力的手。

sentences.english: Uighurs with disciplinary problems or criminal offenses are treated leniently , they say.
sentences.chinese: 他们说，政府对违法犯罪的维吾尔族人进行宽大处理。

sentences.english: He was watching the red flames in the wide open fireplace .
sentences.chinese: 他注视着敞着的宽大壁炉里的熊熊火焰。

sentences.english: Chiefly British A hawk of the genus Buteo , having broad wings and a broad tail.
sentences.chinese: 属的一种鹰，有宽大的翅膀和宽尾巴。

sentences.english: His father, Michael Douglas, wrote a letter to the judge asking for leniency.
sentences.chinese: 父亲道格拉斯致函法官恳求宽大处理。

sentences.english: Vigorous plants have thick & large leaves, strong disease resistance.
sentences.chinese: 植株生长势强，叶片宽大肥厚，抗病性强，座果率高。

sentences.english: The H frame body shape has a larger waist and shoulders.
sentences.chinese: H型身材腰与肩膀的部位稍为宽大。

sentences.english: A love seat is a wide chair.
sentences.chinese: 爱情座椅是一种宽大的椅子。

sentences.english: I wish their mother would letup on the children.
sentences.chinese: 我希望他们的妈妈对孩子们宽大一些。

sentences.english: It was a sunny day. I stood on a spacious balcony.
sentences.chinese: 一个艳阳天，我站在宽大的阳台上。

sentences.english: That officer, Liu Linan, was given leniency after turning himself in.
sentences.chinese: 这名警察叫刘力男，他由于自首而被宽大处理。

sentences.english: Stern as a soldier might be, but hearty, and placable always.
sentences.chinese: 严厉，正如一个战士会有的性情，但总是诚恳，宽大。

sentences.english: At 35-inches wide, considerably wider than any other conventional First Class seat.
sentences.chinese: 英吋，比传统头等舱更为宽大，让您尽享极致奢华。

sentences.english: Gifted automobile body is more wide and abound the exterior that force feels.
sentences.chinese: 赋予了车身更加宽大而富于力量感的外观。

sentences.english: I lay down beside it, and with my pale fingers I touched the broad leaves.
sentences.chinese: 我躺在水潭边上，用我苍白的手指摩挲宽大的树叶。
